name: Nano Venezuela
description: [Nano Venezuela](https://nano.org.ve) is a foundation where its main goal is to promote Nano in Venezuela, we have done so through social networks such as [Twitter](https://twitter.com/FundacionNanoVE) and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/fundacionnanove). We have hosted [events/meetups](https://www.instagram.com/p/BwF_M8HAMmZ) in the past and we have participated in important [meetups](https://www.instagram.com/p/B1KZruAAFOI) to spread the Nano word
